rows.label: qev050506_MSG0001
rows.name: I am ever in your debt, my good BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0002
rows.name:
I have been eagerly awaiting your promised return.
Have you the ingredients?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hmm... I see meat and various vegetables.
These at least are familiar to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0004
rows.name:
I should hope so. Though I'm guessing you probably
just throw them into the fire, burn 'em to hell,
and then eat the crispy remains, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0005
rows.name:
Which means you're going to need some lessons in
basic food preparation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0006
rows.name: I shall be your most eager of students![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well, I'm already in this thing up to my eyeballs—
may as well see it through. Let's head into the kitchen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0008
rows.name: ...Well, it LOOKS like curry, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0009
rows.name:
I walked him through the process start to finish,
but didn't touch the food at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0010
rows.name:
Which means this curry is completely the creation of
Chef Ni Zain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll admit I was surprised at how quickly he took to it.
...And less surprising, he handles a knife like a pro.
It could be that he's a natural-born chef.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Sheff? What is this sheff? Is it an honorific title given
to those tasked with preparing meals?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0013
rows.name:
Er, yes, basically. It's what we call people who use
food to make people happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0014
rows.name: A natural-born sheff...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yeah, well, we should probably have a taste-test before
I start handing out stars to your theoretical restaurant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0016
rows.name:
Traditionally, it's the chef who gets to do the honors.
You made it, you try it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0017
rows.name: This is a customary reward?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0018
rows.name:
Er, not a reward so much as a chance for you to
decide if your food is worthy of feeding to others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0019
rows.name: Ah. It seems fitting that I bear that responsibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0022
rows.name: This...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0023
rows.name: Well? How's it taste?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0024
rows.name:
The immediate thrill when it touches the tongue...
The burning warmth as it passes down the throat...
The sense of satiety it brings upon reaching the gut...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0025
rows.name:
And above all, the spicy flavor that strikes the palate
with the force of a punch! Exhilarating! Shocking!
My heart dances, madam![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0026
rows.name: What manner of divine food is this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0027
rows.name: Um, curry? I thought we...covered that part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0028
rows.name:
I am truly experiencing "delicious" for the first time...
This is the greatest pleasure I have known!
My mouth SCREAMS with delight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0029
rows.name:
Um...okay? Let's not go overboard here.
It can't be THAT good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0030
rows.name:
Here. Gimme. You're too crazy to have a rational
opinion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0031
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0033
rows.name: Holy snot. It IS really good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0034
rows.name:
Actually... Wow, I can't believe this, but I don't think
I've ever tasted a curry this delicious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0035
rows.name:
Thanks to your tutelage, madam, I have glimpsed the
first hint of the secrets of cooking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0036
rows.name: My sword never rivaled that of His Highness...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0037
rows.name: But my curry will lose to no Wrothian![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0038
rows.name:
I feel I am finally able to stand as the prince's equal.
I have found a path that I can walk without shame.
A self in which I can take pride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0039
rows.name: I am in your debt, most beautiful and wise madam![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0040
rows.name:
I swear unto you that I will never forget this moment,
not my sense of gratitude and wonder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0041
rows.name:
I will let these feelings drive me down the honorable
path of the sheff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0042
rows.name: Heh. One batch of curry and you've hit enlightenment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0043
rows.name:
And you, good BLADE! From my blade to the recipes
to the ingredients, you have done me one kind service
after the next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0044
rows.name:
I ask that you watch as I hone my skill as a sheff.
The day I perfect my craft is the day you shall feast
like a [ST:gender p1=king p2=queen ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0045
rows.name: I thank you from the core of my being![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0046
rows.name:
Ah, I only just remembered—I expect you initially came
looking for me at the behest of someone from the
Mimeosome Maintenance Center, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0047
rows.name:
Well, as you have seen, I now burn with newfound
purpose. I fear I cannot go back there now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0048
rows.name:
I will explain that to the workers there myself, however.
You need only accept this humble token of my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0049
rows.name: You honor me by taking it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0050
rows.name: "Cu-rry." Even the sound of it has an exotic flavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0051
rows.name:
Despite hearing it described, I cannot quite imagine it.
Spices in general are foreign to the Wrothian palate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050506_MSG0052
rows.name:
I do not even know what a "spice" looks like.
It is a mystery...[ST:wait ]
